hotels.title: Portugal Algarve Adventure near Vilamoura Beach with Seafront Restaurant
hotels.description: Mere moments from the beautiful beaches of Vilamoura, Crowne Plaza Vilamoura - Algarve, an IHG Hotel, promises a picturesque Portuguese surf and sand stay. A luxurious experience awaits you, with delectable local specialties at Cataplana restaurant or chilled cocktails by the pool. Treat yourself to a soothing spa treatment or head out to sun-drenched strips of coast to lounge by crashing waves before exploring vibrant bars and restaurants only a few steps away.
